thread.section_title: Mila Kunis News on Husband Ashton Kutcher, Children and More | Daily Mail Online
thread.title: Ashton Kutcher and prepare for the Super Bowl
thread.title_full: Ashton Kutcher and Mila Kunis prepare for the Super Bowl | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail Reporter
title: Ashton Kutcher and prepare for the Super Bowl
text:
Mila Kunis and Ashton Kutcher are avid sports fans.
And on Sunday, the couple stepped out for breakfast in Beverly Hills with their two children ahead of the Super Bowl.
Their precious two-year-old daughter, Wyatt, proudly donned a Chicago Bears jersey on the outing.
Not taking sides: Ashton Kutcher and Mila Kunis' daughter Wyatt wears football jersey for family breakfast on Super Bowl Sunday
Little Wyatt was dressed in a No. 3 jersey which she teamed with matching leggings and grey sneakers.
Ashton, who hails from Iowa, is well known for being a Chicago Bears fan.
The 38-year-old actor donned a Bears baseball cap and was otherwise dressed in neutral clothing.
Doting dad: Ashton carried their two-month-old son Dimitri in a car seat as they exited the restaurant
Da Bears! Mila and her little girl both sported Chicago gear
Family brunch: Mila was busy on her cell phone while little Wyatt was seen holding her grandfather's hand
The father-of-two looked laid-back in grey slim-fit jeans and a black puffer jacket and trainers.
Mila was also outfitted in Chicago gear.
The 33-year-old Ukraine-born beauty sported a white and blue stripped long-sleeve T-shirt which featured faded letters.
Avid supporter: Ashton, who hails from Iowa, is well known for being a Chicago Bears fan
Casual day: The 38-year-old actor donned a Bears baseball cap and looked laid-back in grey slim-fit jeans and a black puffer jacket and trainers
While the That 70's Show alums walked to their car, Ashton could be seen carrying a baby-sized car seat with their two-month-old son Dimitri bundled up in a blue blanket.
In November the proud papa and his wife were overjoyed to welcome their second child to the world, weighing in at a healthy eight-pounds 15-ounces.
Their daughter Wyatt Isabelle was born in October 2014.
Game day! The 33-year-old Ukraine-born beauty sported a white and blue stripped long-sleeve T-shirt which featured faded letters
